item.title: U.K. starts enforcing online age check rules
item.description: A U.K. law requiring that pornography websites verify the age of their users took effect Friday.

item.title: Tesla vet says that ‘reviewing real products’ — not mockups — is the key to staying innovative
item.description: “No slides was our first rule,” McNeil told the audience earlier this month at TC All Stage in Boston. “You have to be reviewing real product.”
